name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving
into the art of cooking and dining well, this experience helps you engage all
five senses when you're in the kitchen. The caviar on the top is relishing a
wonderful meal that you, along with a bunch of people, will cook together.  
  
**_The theme of this cookalong is Neapolitan Pizza._**  

  * **The cookalong** : Learn to make and stretch the Pizza Dough, assemble the pizza with toppings, taste different cheeses and the house sauce. Learn how to use a wood fired oven to bake pizzas.
  * **The meal** : Virgin Mojito, the Pizza that you make, Dessert.

Note: The cookalong includes vegetarian and non-vegetarian meal options.

name: Treasures From The Estates
description:
Switch from coffee enthusiast to aficionado in this unique coffee appreciation
experience. Delve into the world of premium Indian Estate Coffees, and learn
the nuances of brewing and tasting single-origin brews, including a cold one.

This immersive experience helps you develop a keen sense of understanding
about unique Indian coffees and what makes them special. We will cover three
brewing methods - AeroPress, FrenchPress and Pour Over.

**_Join us for the Brunch edit. Enjoy Trove’s signature coffee brewing
experience alongside a special breakfast menu curated by Chef Ashley of Monkey
Bar._**

Attendees can opt for either a vegetarian or non-vegetarian set breakfast
menu, which will include all items mentioned below.

  * **Veg Meal:** Chole Bhature, Mini Fruit Bowl, and Mini Muffin.
  * **Non Veg Meal:** Mushroom & Cheese Omelette (with a slice of bread, butter & side salad), Mini Muesli Bowl, and Mini Muffin.

Fresh watermelon juice will be served to all attendees.

name: Echoes of Calm
description:
The use of sound for healing dates back thousands of years to various ancient
cultures. Indigenous peoples have long used drums, chanting, and other
instruments for ceremonial and therapeutic purposes. These practices were
often tied to spiritual rituals and were believed to have healing properties.

This immersive sound bath experience is built on the enduring belief in the
power of sound, and sets you on the path to healing, relaxation, and spiritual
growth.

name: Oasis Of Scents
description:
An ode to the masterful craft of perfume making and the country's best noses,
this experience will have you develop a discerning sense of smell, understand
the nuances of perfumery as a science and art, as well as how fragrances
passively contribute to our overall experiences to create a lasting memory.

_**The experience includes navigating through various fragrance notes to
formulate your own customised bottle of perfume, under the guidance of an
expert.**_

name: Wonders of Horology
description:
Delve into the enchanting world of watchmaking, and gain a deeper
understanding about the stellar craftsmanship and intricate detailing that go
into the making of luxe time pieces.

This experience will have you discover the nuanced art and science of watch-
making, and help you look at time from a whole new perspective under the
guidance of an expert horologist.

_**The experience includes navigating through various components of Time
Making, the intricacies of Fine Watchmaking in an immersive visual journey
under the guidance of an expert.**_

name: Spin City
description:
While the origin story of pole art is multifaceted, spanning across multiple
cultures and time periods, today pole dance is regarded as an art form
celebrated for its fusion of athleticism, grace, and creativity.

_**This experience is an immersion into the art of pole movement, looking
beyond its association with strip clubs to embracing it as a wonderful way to
move and stay fit.**_

name: Treasures From The Estates
description:
Switch from coffee enthusiast to aficionado in this unique coffee appreciation
experience. Delve into the world of premium Indian Estate Coffees, and learn
the nuances of brewing and tasting single-origin brews, including a cold one.

This immersive experience helps you develop a keen sense of understanding
about unique Indian coffees and what makes them special. We will cover three
brewing methods - AeroPress, FrenchPress and Pour Over.

name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving
into the art of cooking and dining well, this experience helps you engage all
five senses when you're in the kitchen. The caviar on the top is relishing a
wonderful meal that you, along with a bunch of people, will cook together.  
  
**_The theme for this cookalong is Japanese cuisine - Sushi making. _**

  * **The cookalong** :

**Observe:** Our expert will demonstrate how to roll three types of sushi from
scratch: Maki, uramaki, and temaki sushi.  

**Make Your Own Sushi:** Learn to make four types of sushi from scratch using
various fillings and rolling styles, as demonstrated by the chef and savour
them.

_Note:_ The cookalong and the meal will include both vegetarian (exotic
vegetables and yasai vegetables) and non-vegetarian (salmon and crab) options.

Additionally, all guests will be served asparagus tempura and pickled
vegetables.
